mapper.sql: sys_storage_config.id, sys_storage_config.access_key, sys_storage_config.access_secret, sys_storage_config.endpoint, sys_storage_config.bucket, sys_storage_config.type, sys_storage_config.create_time, sys_storage_config.update_time, sys_storage_config.dir, sys_storage_config.is_https, sys_storage_config.del_flag, sys_storage_config.tenant_id, sys_storage_config.create_by, sys_storage_config.update_by, sys_storage_config.status
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM sys_storage_config AS sys_storage_config
sys_storage_config.del_flag = '0' AND sys_storage_config.`status` = '0'
